title: Clean Up Project-Specific Command Files
description: Several command files appear project-specific rather than template-generic: create_forms.md, generate_reports.md, setup_database.md, run_analysis.md. These should be moved to examples or removed to avoid confusion.
completion_notes: Moved 4 project-specific command files (setup_database.md, create_forms.md, run_analysis.md, generate_reports.md) from .claude/commands/ to examples/project-specific-commands/. These files were from the SIREN project and not applicable to the generic template. Created comprehensive README.md in examples directory explaining the purpose of each command, how to use them as examples, best practices demonstrated, and guidance for creating new project-specific commands. This cleanup reduces confusion about which commands are template-generic vs project-specific.
notes: These commands appear to be from a specific project implementation rather than generic template commands. Should be moved to examples directory.
assumptions: Commands are from a specific project
decision_rationale: Project-specific commands in template repository cause confusion about what's generic vs specific.
